name: Lakshmi Vishwakarma
objective: Hi, my name is Lakshmi Vishwakarma I'm a Creative / Full Stack Developer from the Pune. In one years I developed a skill set in a range of technologies and frameworks, including React Js, Express js and Python. Where I really value clean and readable code. Also I'm very passionate about UX / UI. My journey into the world of programming has ignited a strong desire to become a full-stack developer. With a keen eye for detail and a knack for problem-solving, I am eager to contribute my skills to dynamic development teams while continuously expanding my knowledge in the pursuit of becoming a well-rounded and proficient full-stack developer.

role: Started as an intern, learning the fundamentals of frontend development. Developed responsive and visually appealing user interfaces using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.Expanded my skillset to include backend technologies and concepts.Developed RESTful APIs to facilitate data exchange between the frontend and backend systems.Proactively engaged in self-guided learning to expand my knowledge in both frontend and backend technologies.
Liasoning with credit and Operations team for the smooth process of proposals , Maintaining daily MIS for login & disbursement and Coordinate with RM'S & ASM'S for BOD & EOD report.

education.courseName: HTML, CSS, and Javascript for Web Developers
education.description: I successfully completed a course from John Hopkins University, learning how to start from basic to advance, also I have created some website using HTML, CSS, Javascript. I also enjoyed the close connection with UX that this approach brings.

I have completed my PG from ICCI computer academy, which is affiliated with Makhanlal Chaturvedi National University of Journalism and Communication, Bhopal . Here I developed a good sense of both creative and technical skills.

education.instituteName: Sarojini Naidu Govt Girls PG College, Bhopal
education.description: I graduated from my bachelor's degree with good grades. I have done my graduation in Biology .I choose the profile of Nature & Health. which allowed me to explore my interests.
